com.theoryinpractise.halbuilder.api

Interface ReadableRepresentation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContentRepresentation, Representation

    public interface ReadableRepresentation
    A ReadableRepresentation is a read-only, immutable HAL Representation object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns all links matching the given rel by searching this representation.

      Returns an ImmutableMap of the resources properties.

      Returns a Link with a rel of "self".

      Returns a map of all embedded resources
      Collection<Map.Entry<String,ReadableRepresentation>> getResources()
      Returns an immutable Collection of the resources currently embedded in this resource.

    • Method Detail

      • getResourceLink

        Link getResourceLink()
        Returns a Link with a rel of "self".
        Returns:
        A Link

      • getNamespaces

        Map<String,String> getNamespaces()
        Returns an ImmutableMap of the currently defined resource namespaces
        Returns:
        A Map

      • getCanonicalLinks

        List<Link> getCanonicalLinks()
        Returns an ImmutableList of individual Link instances on this resource.
        Returns:
        A List of Links

      • getLinks

        List<Link> getLinks()
        Returns an ImmutableList of collated Link instances on this resource.

        Multiple links to the same resolved HREF are collated into a single Link instance with a space separated combined rel attribute.

        Returns:
        A List of Links

      • getLinkByRel

        Link getLinkByRel(String rel)
        Returns the first link matching the given rel by searching this representation.
        Parameters:
        rel - The rel type to search for.
        Returns:
        A Guava Optional Link

      • getLinksByRel

        List<Link> getLinksByRel(String rel)
        Returns all links matching the given rel by searching this representation.
        Parameters:
        rel - The rel type to search for.
        Returns:
        An Immutable List of Links

      • getResourcesByRel

        List<? extends ReadableRepresentation> getResourcesByRel(String rel)
        Returns all embedded resources matching the given rel by searching this, then any embedded resource instance.
        Parameters:
        rel - The rel type to search for.
        Returns:
        An Immutable List of Resources

      • getValue

        Object getValue(String name)
        Returns a property from the Representation
        Parameters:
        name - The property to return
        Returns:
        An Object of the property value, or throws RepresentationException if missing

      • getValue

        Object getValue(String name,
                Object defaultValue)
        Returns a property from the Representation
        Parameters:
        name - The property to return
        Returns:
        An Object of the property value, or a user supplied default value

      • getProperties

        Map<String,Object> getProperties()
        Returns an ImmutableMap of the resources properties.
        Returns:
        A Map

      • hasNullProperties

        boolean hasNullProperties()
        Return an indication of whether this resource, or subresources of this resource, contain null properties.
        Returns:
        True if this resource, or subresources of this resource, contain null properties. False if not.

      • getResources

        Collection<Map.Entry<String,ReadableRepresentation>> getResources()
        Returns an immutable Collection of the resources currently embedded in this resource.
        Returns:
        A Map

      • getResourceMap

        Map<String,Collection<ReadableRepresentation>> getResourceMap()
        Returns a map of all embedded resources
        Returns:

      • isSatisfiedBy

        boolean isSatisfiedBy(Contract contract)
        Returns whether this resource is satisfied by the provided Contact.
        Parameters:
        contract - The contract to check.
        Returns:
        A boolean

      • toClass

        <T> T toClass(Class<T> anInterface)
        Returns an proxy to the given interface mirroring the resource.
        Parameters:
        anInterface - An interface to mirror
        Returns:
        A Representation Proxy or throws a RepresentationException

      • toString

        String toString(String contentType)
        Returns the resource in the requested content-type.

        application/hal+xml and application/hal+json are provided by default, additional Renderers can be added to a RepresentationFactory.

        Parameters:
        contentType - The content type requested
        Returns:
        A String

      • toString

        @Deprecated
String toString(String contentType,
                            Set<URI> flags)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the resource in the requested content-type, along with additional flags.

        application/hal+xml and application/hal+json are provided by default, additional Renderers can be added to a RepresentationFactory.

        Parameters:
        contentType - The content type requested
        flags - A set of URI based flags to customize rendering
        Returns:
        A String

      • toString

        String toString(String contentType,
                URI... flags)
        Returns the resource in the requested content-type, along with additional flags.

        application/hal+xml and application/hal+json are provided by default, additional Renderers can be added to a RepresentationFactory.

        Parameters:
        contentType - The content type requested
        flags - A set of URI based flags to customize rendering
        Returns:
        A String

      • toString

        void toString(String contentType,
              Writer writer)
        Write the resource in the requested content-type, to the specified Writer

        application/hal+xml and application/hal+json are provided by default, additional Renderers can be added to a RepresentationFactory.

        Parameters:
        contentType - The content type requested
        writer - The Writer to write to

        flags - A set of URI based flags to customize rendering

        void toString(String contentType,
              Writer writer,
              URI... flags)
        Write the resource in the requested content-type, along with additional flags to the specified Writer

        application/hal+xml and application/hal+json are provided by default, additional Renderers can be added to a RepresentationFactory.

        Parameters:
        contentType - The content type requested
        flags - A set of URI based flags to customize rendering
